        public Features()

    • Method Detail

      • bounds

        public static Envelope bounds(Feature f)
        Returns the bounds of the feature object.

        The bounds is computed by computing the aggregated bounds of all geometries of the feature object. Projections are not taken into account. To handle geometries in different projections use the boundsReprojected(Feature) method.

        Parameters:
        f - The feature.
        Returns:
        The bounds, or a bounds object in which Envelope.isNull() returns true.

      • boundsReprojected

        public static Envelope boundsReprojected(Feature f)
        Returns the bounds of the feature object, reprojecting geometries of the feature if required.

        The bounds is computed by computing the aggregated bounds of all geometries of the feature object. All geometries are reprojected to the crs returned from * f.geometry(). Therefore this method requires that the features default geometry has a crs object.

        Parameters:
        f - The feature.
        Returns:
        The bounds, or a bounds object in which Envelope.isNull() returns true.

      • boundsReprojected

        public static Envelope boundsReprojected(Feature f,
                         org.osgeo.proj4j.CoordinateReferenceSystem crs)
        Returns the bounds of the feature object, reprojecting geometries of the feature if required.

        The bounds is computed by computing the aggregated bounds of all geometries of the feature object in the specified crs.

        Parameters:
        f - The feature.
        crs - The target projection.
        Returns:
        The bounds, or a bounds object in which Envelope.isNull() returns true.

      • retype

        public static Feature retype(Feature feature,
             Schema schema)
        Retypes a feature object to a new schema.

        This method works by "pulling" the attributes defined by the fields of Schema from the feature object.

        Parameters:
        feature - The original feature.
        schema - The schema to retype to.
        Returns:
        The retyped feature.

      • copy

        public static Feature copy(Feature from,
           Feature to)
        Copies values from one feature to another.
        Parameters:
        from - THe source feature.
        to - The target feature.
        Returns:
        The target feature.

      • multify

        public static Schema multify(Schema schema)
        Converts non geometry collection types in the schema to appropriate collection type.
        Parameters:
        schema - The original schema.
        Returns:
        The transformed schema.

      • multify

        public static Feature multify(Feature feature)
        Converts non collection geometry objects to associated collection type.
        Parameters:
        feature - The original feature.
        Returns:
        The transformed feature.

      • crs

        public static org.osgeo.proj4j.CoordinateReferenceSystem crs(Feature f)
        Returns the crs of a feature.

        The crs of a feature is a crs associated with it's default geometry.

        See Also:
        Feature.geometry(), Proj.crs(Geometry)

      • id

        public static String id(String id)
        Returns a new feature id if the specified id is null.

      • schema

        public static Optional<Schema> schema(VectorDataset data)
                               throws IOException
        Derives a schema for a vector dataset.

        This method computes the schema by inspecting the first feature.

        Parameters:
        data - The dataset.
        Returns:
        The optional schema.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • schema

        public static Schema schema(String name,
            Feature f)
        Creates a schema from a feature object.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the schema.
        f - The feature.
        Returns:
        The new schema.
        See Also:
        SchemaBuilder#fields(Feature)}

      • equals

        public static boolean equals(Feature f1,
             Feature f2)
        Compares two feature objects for equality.

        Equality is based on Feature.id() and contents obtained from Feature.map().

        Parameters:
        f1 - The first feature.
        f2 - The second feature.
        Returns:
        True if the two features are equal.

      • hashCode

        public static int hashCode(Feature f)
        Computes the hashcode for a feature.

        To remain consistent with equals(Feature, Feature) the hash code is computed based on Feature.id() and Feature.map()

        Parameters:
        f - The feature.
        Returns:
        A hashcode.

      • toString

        public static String toString(Feature f)
        Returns a string representation of a feature.

        Implementations of Feature are encouraged to use this method to implement Feature#toString().
